Chris Irish Ruby Developer

Chris has a BS in Computer Science from Arizona State University and has been developing software for the web since 2003. He is an accomplished Ruby and Javascript developer with a broad range of experience in e-commerce, social networks and faceted search for clients ranging from large national brands to local startups.
